name: Songs About Trucks Tee
description: This is a Gildan 2000 blend black tee that is 50% cotton & 50% polyester. The front has a truck catching fire while the back has a truck that mudded through the words "What Ever Happened To A Feeling Bad Song". With a W emblem on the left sleeve that says Songs About Truck on a banner in front of it.

name: Women's Anchor Deep V Baby Doll
description: This is the 3540 Next Level Midnight Navy Deep V baby Doll TEE. I it say "We Shall Drinka tha Vodka Togetha" on a banner draped across an anchor.

name: Red 15 Years Tee
description: Red Gildan 2000 Brand Tee. It says "Fifteen Years of Original Country Music".

name: Men's Anchor Tee
description: This a Navy Gildan 5000 tee. It has an anchor with a banner saying "We Shall Drinka tha Vodka Togetha"

name: WB Flamming Pick Baby Doll Tee
description: This is a 100% cotton Next Level Perfect Tee.

name: Pink Tapped in Texas Tee
description: This is 100% pre-shrunk cotton Gildan Tee. With Wade worker patch screen printed on the left front chest and Wade's standard Tapped in Texas Oil Derrick screen printed on the on the back in black and white.

name: Black Tapped in Texas Tee
description: This is a 100% pre-shrunk cotton Gildan Tee. With a Wade worker patch screen printed on the left front chest and Wade's standard Tapped in Texas Oil Derrick screen printed on the on the back in Red and White.

name: 3/4 Sleeve Trouble Baseball Tee
description: This is a 3/4 Sleeve Baseball Tee made by Champion. It is Heather Grey & Navy that is 90% cotton &10% polyester with Wade Bowen & the Logo Guitar pick on the front & Trouble 98 on the back in Red & Navy ink.

name: Autographed 15 Years of Music Poster w/Blue Light CD
description: This is a limited edition Autographed Concert poster numbered to 100 in celebration of 15 years of WB playing music. With the purchase of the poster you also receive a Live @ The Blue Light for no extra cost.

name: Wade Bowen Logo Sign (Autographed)
description:
Wade Bowen Logo Tacker Sign. It is made of tin and is the exact design of 
Wade's Logo Guitar Pick. The are hand Autographed by Wade himself.  The is is 18 1/2" Tall X 17" Wide.   "This is not a Guitar Pick!"

name: Trouble Youth Onesies & Toddler
description: These are Rabbit Skin 100% cotton toddler youth outfits. They are in Pink & Royal Blue. The front has a Smiley face with head phones & a music note and the back say I Wish Trouble Always looked this Cute/Awesome with a guitar on the back.

name: Mint Guitar Pick Baby Doll
description: This is a Next Level Brand Perfect Tee. This is a 100% Cotton Baby Doll

name: American Guitar Koozie
description: It the American Flag Guitar that says The Given, Original American Music with the Guitar Pick. This is a Neoprene Koozie with stitching

name: WB's Forrest Green 15 Year of Original Music Tee
description: This is a 50/50 blend Forrest Green Heather American Apparel Shirt. It has a round logo that is orange, blue & White colored saying 98-13 fifteen Years Of Original Music.

name: Red Headed Women Tee
description: This is a Black 100% pre-shrunk cotton Gildan Tee. With Wade Bowen and the Guitar Pick center on the front chest and a beautiful Red Headed Women holding a Cigarette with the smoke creating the words Red Headed Women with a Cigarette on the back.

name: Wade Bowen Sunglasses
description: These are 5 five fold sunglasses that are molded to imitate Ray Bans they come in Red or Blue with Wade's Logo & name on each side. They are UV400 in sun protection.

name: Wade Bowen American Guitar Tee
description: This Shirt is a Tri Blend Canvas brand Tee. Its Heather Grey with an American Flag guitar that says The Given, Wade Bowen & Original American Music on the Front. It is a Front Only Print

name: Wade Bowen 98'-13' Singer Songwriter Koozie
description: These are Neoprene Stitch Koozies with Wade's Guitar Pick logo circled by Wade Bowen 98' 13' Singer Songwriter

name: Braun Brother Reunion
description: This is the Braun Brother Reunion Tee. I has a piece of paper that say "I got stranded in Idaho. Now I'm stuck in Challis surrounded by a bunch of Brauns. Please send help. Wade Bowen" on the back of a Dusk blue Gildan Tee.

name: Livers of Steel Tour Tee
description: If you made it out to one of the Livers of Steel tour shows on the West Coast and missed your chance to get Swag. Here you go. It has RK, MMC & WB's logo on the front & the dates on the back. Don't miss out and get them before they are gone.

name: Wade Bowen Letterman Hoodie
description: Its a Red & Heather Grey Alternative Earth Brand soft hoodie. Made of 50% Polyester 46% Cotton & 4% Rayon with screen print embroidered W on the front left chest and Wade Bowen Est. 1998 centered on the back.

name: Kiss Me I'm Trouble
description: This is your Lucky day! It is a 100% cotton Kelly Green Gildan T-Shirt that says Kiss Me I'm Trouble with WB's Guitar Pick and a four leaf cover on the front and on the back it has the his Logo over a four leaf centered on the shoulders.

name: Saturday Night Tank
description: Bella Brand, Flowy jersey racerback with A-line body and sheering at racerback seam.  65% Polyester/35% Viscose with Neon Pink & White ink.

name: Trouble Gym Short
description: These are Heather Grey Soffe Brand Gym Shorts. They are 50% Cotton 50% Polyester with Trouble 98 on the front and Wade Bowen & the logo Guitar Pick on the back.

name: Peace, Love & Still Trouble V-Neck
description: This is a Black 100% cotton burnout V-Neck baby doll Tee. With Wade Bowen in Purple & White center on the front & Peace Love & Still Trouble on the back.

name: Lake Blue & Red Logo T
description: American Apparel brand made with 50% combed cotton & 50% polyester

name: W Patch Hat
description: The W Patch Hat has a patch with Wade Bowen with a Big W in Bowen stitched in on a grey full panel hat. This is a non structured hat with Velcro on the back to make it one size fits all. It has a Guitar pick tag on the back of the strap.

name: Fitted W Hat
description: This is a Red, White & Blue fitted one size fits most hat with a Big White W centered on the front with Wade Bowen in Red on the back Wade Guitar Pick on the side. It is a Perfect Fit Flex Hat.

name: Purple Tapped in West Texas
description: Purple Gildan 5000 which is 100% pre-shrunk cotton

name: The Given Album shirt
description:
Bella-Canvas Brand Silver
100% combed ringspun cotton jersey
Supremely soft, superior quality
Modern, slightly fitted shape

name: THE GIVEN CD
description:
THE GIVEN! Wade's latest album! 10 new tracks that includes his Top 40 hit "Saturday Night" and latest single "To Live is to Fly".

Track List
1. Saturday Night
2. All That's Left
3. A Battle Won
4. Patch of Bad Weather
5. On My Way To Wonderful
6. Say Anything
7. You Ain't Got Me
8. Beat Me Down
9. To Live Is To Fly (Featuring Guy Clark)
10. Before These Walls Were Blue

name: Forrest Green 2012
description: This is a 100% Pre-Shrunk Forrest Green T-Shirt, with our Guitar Pick Logo in orange on the front left chest and centered on the back with Wade Bowen, 2012, Established 1998 circling it in white.

name: Women's V-Neck Burnout Football Jersey
description: WB's Women's V-Neck Burnout Football Jersey is made of 50% Cotton & 50% Polyester. It is made exclusively by Blue 84 apparel. Its a high quality shirt, but tends to run a little small through the arms.

name: Baseball 3/4 Sleeve T-Shirt
description:
A classic grey and navy blue baseball Tee with 3/4 length sleeves that features a baseball inspired Wade logo across the front with the bands establishment date, 1998. The back serves as a true jersey with "Bowen" listed as the last name and the number '98 in reference to the establishment date. 

90% cotton blend Tee. Runs a little large, not fitted.

name: Peace, Love & Trouble Girls T-Shirt Short Sleeve (Pink)
description:
Black burnout, fitted Women's Tee features bright Pink and white script that proclaims: Peace Love & Trouble on the front and Wade Bowen Junkie on the back. 

100% Cotton Primatee.

name: Peace, Love & Trouble Girls T-Shirt Short Sleeve (Teal)
description:
Black burnout, fitted Women's Tee features bright aquamarine blue and white script that proclaims: Peace Love & Trouble on the front and Wade Bowen Junkie on the back. 

100% Cotton Pima tee.

name: WB Guitar Pick Koozies
description: An Assorted colors of Wade Bowen Guitar Pick Koozies

name: Wade Bowen KeyChain Bottle Opener
description: This Stainless Steel Bottle Opener is also a 3 ring Key Organizer.

name: Navy Tapped in West Texas T-Shirt
description: A bestseller!! A classic navy blue Tee with red and white screen print that proclaims Wade Bowen "Tapped In West Texas" with an image of oil wells on the back. The front also features a left chest name tag looking screen print that simply says, "Wade".

name: Dancehall Kid T-Shirt
description: Youth T-Shirt, says "This Ain't No Dancehall Kid" on the front and Wade Bowen on the Back.

name: Peace, Love & Trouble Long Sleeve Girls T-Shirt (Teal)
description:
Long Sleeved Black burnout, fitted Women's Tee features bright aquamarine blue and white script that proclaims: Peace Love & Trouble on the front and Wade Bowen Junkie on the back. 

100% Cotton Primatee.

name: Saturday Night Long Sleeve & Short Sleeve Tee
description: Black Gildan Short Sleeve & Long Sleeve

name: Peace, Love & Trouble Long Sleeve Girls T-Shirt (Pink)
description:
Long Sleeved Black burnout, fitted Women's Tee features bright PINK and WHITE script that proclaims: Peace Love & Trouble on the front and Wade Bowen Junkie on the back. 

100% Cotton Primatee.

name: Wade Bowen Logo Magnet
description: 3x4 Magnet with Wade's Official Logo on it. Great for holding important notes on your Refrigerator and showing support of your favorite band.

name: Wade Bowen W Tank
description: This is an Black American Apparel 100% Combed Cotten Tank Top. It has a Large Pink W with Wade Bowen in Pink & White in front of it and there is a Grey Background with stars in it.

name: Live @ Billy Bobs CD (2 CD/DVD Combo)
description: Recorded Live at Billy Bob's in Texas, features 2 CDs and a DVD of that crazy, historic night!

name: Dancehall T-Shirt (Collegiate Colors)
description:
One of the most classic Wade Bowen Tees.  Now in Collegiate Colors heavy duty Men's Tee of 100% pre-shrunk Cotton that says Wade Bowen on the front and "This Ain't No Dancehall Band" on the back with the silhouette of a hand.  
Colors:  Red/Black, Burnt Orange/White, Green/Yellow, Maroon/White & Purple/White 

Limit Sizes and Quantities.  Get the while they Last!!!!!

name: Dancehall T-Shirt
description: One of the most classic Wade Bowen Tees.  A grey heavy duty Men's Tee that says Wade Bowen on the front and "This Ain't No Dancehall Band" on the back with the silhouette of a hand.

name: Wade Bowen Cross Beanie
description:
Just in time for the winter months. Black knit beanie features full color screen print designs coupled with embroidery of a cross and Wade's full name. 

One size fits all.

name: Texas Emblem Tee
description:
NEW MERCHANDISE for the Summer!

A great summer time Tee. A super-soft Next Level crew neck polyester/cotton blend Tee in a smoky pale blue. Features a crest made of the Texas flag with a 'W' emblazoned across it, encircled completely by stars with Wade's name below. All colors are red, white and two different colors of blue.

name: God Bless This Town
description: This shirt is a Navy Hanes Beefy T made of 100% Preshrunk Cotton. It has a Box Car with God Bless this Town in Graffiti on the side of it and below says Wade Bowen/Lost Hotel.

name: Filligree Tank
description:
NEW MERCHANDISE for Summer!

White, long and lean ribbed tank features a small, delicate, feminine filigree design in a chocolate brown surrounding Wade's name in a cool orange. 

See second photo for a detailed view of the design.

name: Women's Southwest Cross Tee
description:
BRAND NEW MERCHANDISE for the Summer! 

A super soft, Next-Level cotton and polyester blend crew neck Tee in a summer cool aquamarine blue/green. Features an orange and white southwestern cross design with Wade's name below in a slightly distressed print. 

A great light weight and bright colored summer time Tee.

name: Red Tapped in West Texas T-Shirt (Online Exclusive)
description: A Bestseller!! A classic red Tee with yellow and black screen print that proclaims Wade Bowen "Tapped In West Texas" with an image of oil wells on the back. The front also features a left chest name tag looking screen print that simply says, "Wade".

name: Live @ Billy Bob's T-Shirt
description:
On SALE! Available while supplies last!

Exclusively created for Wade's recorded live performance at Billy Bob's. This classic black Tee features a paint splattered Wade logo on the front with "Live at Billy Bob's" underneath in bright yellow/orange and white. The back of the Tee features the exact set list from that show in the same paint splattered yellow/orange. 

Also see the the 2-disc CD/DVD recording from this evening.

name: Texas Flag Billy Bob's T-Shirt
description: Save $10 off retail price during our Spring Break Sale! Created exclusively for Wade's recorded performance at Billy Bob's. A classic black or grey Tee that features the outline of the great state of Texas with Wade's name emblazed across the front in the colors and style of the Texas flag. The back features the date of the show, Nov. 21, 2009 along with the tagline: "I was there, this is proof". Just in case you need help remembering! Available in black or grey.

name: Pink Wade Bowen Tank
description: Save $15 off retail price during our Spring Break Sale! Great for Spring! A pale pink, long and lean, ribbed tank features a cool swirling symmetrical design as the background for Wade's name scrolled across the front. Runs slightly small.

name: Mystery of a Woman Black Tank
description: Save $10 off retail price during our Spring Break Sale! Women's long and lean, black tank top with a contrasting paint splatter "Mystery of a Woman" mud flap girl graphic across the chest in blue and red.

name: Orange Wade Bowen Baby Doll
description: This is an Orange & White HYP Brand Baby doll T-shirt. It is 100% Cotton with Wade on front and Bowen on back in a circus looking font.

name: Lost Hotel CD
description: Released in 2006, featuring the fan favorites "Perfect Silence" and "Mood Ring". Track Listing: 01. God Bless This Town 02. One Step Closer 03. Walkin' Along the Fenceline 04. Resurrection 05. Perfect Silence 06. Lay It All On You 07. Lost Hotel 08. It's All Over Town 09. Handle 10. Broken Reflection (Troubadour's Prayer) 11. Crazy Enough 12. Lost Control of My Heart 13. Mood Ring

name: If We Ever Make it Home CD
description: Award Winning Album (Album of the Year, Song of the Year, Vocal Performance of the Year & Artist of the Year). Track Listing: 01. You Had Me At My Best 02. If We Ever Make It Home 03. Turn On The Lights 04. Ghost In This Town 05. Why Makes Perfect Sense 06. Trouble 07. Nobody's Fool 08. Into The Arms of You 09. From Bad to Good 10. Missing You 11. Daddy and The Devil 12. Somewhere Beautiful

options.name: If We Ever Make it Home

name: Try Not to Listen CD
description: Released in 2006. Track Listing: 01. In My Soul 02. Prove It To You 03. Why Can't You Love Me 04. Walking Shoes 05. Things I Could Do 06. Good Time Tonight 07. Please Come To Boston 08. Man Out of Myself 09. Try Not To Listen 10. I Wonder 11. Not Finished Yet 12. Keep Hangin' On

name: Blue Light Live CD
description: Wade Live at the Blue Light! Track Listing: 01. Get Away 02. Tired of Being Alone 03. Try Not to Listen 04. Why Can't You Love Me 05. Starting Right Now 06. Windfall 07. Keep Hangin' On 08. Mystery Of A Woman 09. Walkin' Shoes 10. Who I Am 11. Doug's Song 12. Not Finished Yet 13. Just For Fun

name: Lost Hotel T-Shirt
description: Light blue Tee with a stylishly off center "Lost Hotel" design on the front including Wade's name and album title.

name: Natural Believe T-Shirt
description: Natural Women's Tee features a stylishly off center cross detailed graphic on the left upper side with the song title, "Believe" across it. The  back features "Wade Bowen" across the bottom.

name: Country With Nuts T-Shirt
description: Army green Tee features a star burst design that exclaims, "Country with Nuts" on the front in a contrasting yellow/green and a Wade Bowen belt buckle logo on the upper back of shirt.

name: Its All Part of the Experience T-Shirt
description:
Yellow Gildan T-Shirt


*Limited Tee selection.

name: Red 1998 Hat
description:
On SALE! Available while supplies last!

A classic throwback foam and mesh red trucker hat that simply features "Wade Bowen" "Since 1998" embroidered on the front in bright white. Reminiscent of old seed corn farmer hats from the 70's. Classic indeed.

name: Olive Green/White Trucker Hat
description: Olive green with white canvas and mesh fully adjustable trucker hat features the ever popular rock and roll/horns hand exclaiming "This Ain't No Dancehall Band".

name: Light Blue/White Trucker Hat
description: Light blue with white canvas and mesh fully adjustable trucker hat featuring the ever popular rock and roll/horns hand exclaiming "This Ain't No Dancehall Band".

name: Wade Bowen Stickers
description:
On Sale, while supplies last!

A variety of logo'd Wade Bowen stickers! Get them while you can!
